messages.subject: Hollywood marriages was: Re: Newman
messages.msgSnippet: **I know it s acting but I wonder how hard that is for a couple who act. Could I support my husband in his career if it meant he was going to get naked with
messages.messageBody:
**I know it's acting but I wonder how hard that is for a couple who act.
Could I support my husband in his career if it meant he was going to get
naked with other women frequently? How insecure would I get? Couple that
with endless magazines speculating further and I wonder how any marriages
in Hollywood survive.**


One of my favorite shows is Alias....well was, I haven't seen it in a couple
of months...but anyway.

My friend and I were talking about Sydney's first kiss with Vaughn (sp).
OMG! The steam and chemistry was just oooozing!! Not that that would be
hard, I mean Michael Vartan...oo-la-la! And Jennifer Garner ain't so bad
herself, iykwim! ;P I'd kiss those lips! LOL

I digress.

It wasn't long after that she and Scott Foley announced they were splitting
up. I've heard rumors that she and Michael Vartan are possibly an item, but
whatever. Now, I too cannot imagine being married to an actor and watching
him suck face and whatever else with beautiful women all day, but if I were
Jennifer Garner and *had* to go around kissing Michael Vartan all day???
I'd have to hope that my husband and I were on *tight*. I mean, those two
have amazing chemistry. I don't think you can fake it that well. I have no
idea why they broke up other than their scheduling conflicts, which would be
enough to kill any marriage, even a happy one, but I can well see where
Scott would have every reason to be jealous.

Jennifer (I think we found a house!!!! Going to look inside in the
morning. Yippeee!!!)
